Articles.Content: I just updated KSP to the most recent update and now whenever i try to start the game it only pops up in a tiny window. when i go to full screen mode the graphics get messed up and looks like they pushed together in the middle of the screen. i can vaguely see the bar loading and then i can't do anything.

Please have a look here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

We need a bit more info before we can start guessing at possible causes. Specifically we'll need log files and probably a screenshot.

If you're forcing OpenGL, I suggest try running KSP without OpenGL and see if that works.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
